sections.description: Automatically creates a field to field sync between HubSpot contact properties and WordPress user's fields and updates the data over HubSpot.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements
  • WordPress 4.4 or greater
  • Woocommerce 3.0.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you donâ€™t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Extension, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
Then click Upload Plugin from the browse button you can choose the hubspot-field-to-field-sync.zip file and press ok, you can install it by simply clicking â€œInstall Nowâ€.


Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our extension and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.
